description: Assesses preferences for activities and subjects to guide academic and career choices for students in 10th, 11th/12th, and UG levels.

questions.question_text: How much do you enjoy conducting scientific experiments?

options.text: Very much, I love hands-on science.
Not much, I prefer other activities.

questions.explanation: High interest in experiments aligns with Science streams (B.Sc, MBBS, B.Tech) and careers like M.Sc or M.Tech.

questions.question_text: How interested are you in analyzing financial data or budgets?

options.text: Not interested, I find it boring.

questions.explanation: Interest in financial analysis suits Commerce (B.Com, CA, CFA) and careers like MBA or M.Com.

questions.question_text: Do you enjoy writing essays or stories?

options.text: Very much, I love expressing ideas.

questions.explanation: Writing interest aligns with Arts (B.A, Mass Communication) and careers like M.A or journalism.

questions.question_text: How much do you enjoy coding or programming?

options.text: A lot, I find it exciting.
Not much, it’s not for me.

questions.explanation: Interest in coding suits Science (BCA, BCS, B.Tech) and careers like MCA or M.Sc IT.

questions.question_text: How interested are you in managing teams or projects?

options.text: Not interested, I prefer individual tasks.

questions.explanation: Management interest aligns with Commerce (BBA, BMS) and careers like MBA or MMS.

questions.question_text: Do you enjoy studying biology or human anatomy?

options.text: Not really, I prefer other subjects.

questions.explanation: Interest in biology suits Science (MBBS, B.Sc) and careers like M.Sc.

questions.question_text: How much do you enjoy learning about business strategies?

options.text: A lot, I find it engaging.
Not much, it doesn’t interest me.

questions.explanation: Business strategy interest suits Commerce (BBA, BMS) and careers like MBA.

questions.question_text: How interested are you in creating art or designs?

options.text: Very interested, I love being creative.
Somewhat interested, it’s a fun hobby.
Not interested, I prefer other activities.

questions.explanation: Artistic interest aligns with Arts (BFA, B.A) and careers like creative design.

questions.question_text: Do you enjoy solving complex mathematical problems?

options.text: Very much, I find it challenging.
Somewhat, if I understand the concepts.

questions.explanation: Math interest suits Science (B.Tech, BCS) and Commerce (CA, CFA).

questions.question_text: How much do you enjoy public speaking or presentations?

options.text: A lot, I enjoy engaging audiences.

questions.explanation: Public speaking interest suits Arts (Mass Communication) and Commerce (BBA, MBA).

questions.question_text: How interested are you in learning about computer systems?

options.text: Not interested, I prefer other fields.

questions.explanation: Computer systems interest suits Science (BCA, BCS) and careers like MCA or M.Sc IT.

questions.question_text: Do you enjoy studying historical events or cultures?

options.text: Very much, I find it fascinating.
Not really, I prefer other subjects.

questions.explanation: History interest aligns with Arts (B.A, LLB) and careers like M.A or MSW.

questions.question_text: How much do you enjoy working with data or statistics?

options.text: A lot, I enjoy analyzing data.
Not much, I find it tedious.

questions.explanation: Data analysis interest suits Commerce (CA, CFA) and Science (BCS).

questions.question_text: How interested are you in teaching or mentoring others?

options.text: Very interested, I enjoy helping others learn.
Somewhat interested, if I know the subject.
Not interested, I prefer other roles.

questions.explanation: Teaching interest aligns with Arts (B.Ed) and careers like education or mentoring.

questions.question_text: Do you enjoy solving physics-related problems?

options.text: Very much, I find it exciting.

questions.explanation: Physics interest suits Science (B.Tech, B.Sc) and careers like M.Tech.

questions.question_text: How much do you enjoy creating marketing campaigns?

options.text: A lot, I love creative strategies.
Not much, I prefer other tasks.

questions.explanation: Marketing interest suits Commerce (BBA, BMS) and careers like MBA.

questions.question_text: How interested are you in performing arts like drama or music?

options.text: Not interested, I prefer other activities.

questions.explanation: Performing arts interest aligns with Arts (BFA, B.A) and creative careers.

questions.question_text: Do you enjoy learning about software development?

options.text: Very much, I find it exciting.
Not really, I prefer other fields.

questions.explanation: Software development interest suits Science (BCA, BCS) and careers like MCA.

questions.question_text: How much do you enjoy organizing events or activities?
questions.explanation: Event planning interest suits Commerce (BBA, BMS) and careers like MBA.

options.text: Very interested, I love chemical reactions.
Not interested, I prefer other subjects.

questions.explanation: Chemistry interest suits Science (B.Sc, MBBS) and careers like M.Sc.

options.text: Very much, I find it fascinating.
Not really, I prefer other fields.

questions.explanation: Economics interest suits Commerce (B.Com, CA) and careers like MBA or CFA.

questions.question_text: How much do you enjoy debating or discussing ideas?

options.text: A lot, I love engaging in debates.
Somewhat, if the topic interests me.

questions.explanation: Debating interest suits Arts (Mass Communication, LLB) and Commerce (BBA).

questions.question_text: How interested are you in designing technology solutions?

options.text: Not interested, I prefer other fields.

questions.explanation: Tech design interest suits Science (B.Tech, BCA) and careers like M.Tech.

questions.question_text: Do you enjoy helping communities or social causes?

options.text: Very much, I want to make a difference.

questions.explanation: Social work interest aligns with Arts (B.A, MSW) and careers in social services.

options.text: A lot, I love discovering new knowledge.
